Documentation » Classic

Classic

The free open sourced theme that comes bundled with the Galleria core.

Defaults

{
    transition: "slide",
    thumbCrop: "height"
}

Theme-specific options

{
    // Set this to false if you want the caption to show always
    _toggleInfo: true
}
